extendedInfo.description: Stay connected to the 2012 Democratic National Convention in Charlotte with up-to-date information on convention proceedings at your fingertips. Get photos and videos, stream live speeches, track your favorite memories, and find the best spots in and around Charlotte during convention week. Join President Obama and Vice President Biden for this moment in American history with the Official 2012 Democratic National Convention app.

reviews.title: Live streaming doesn\'t work on Nexus devices
reviews.comment: Live streaming doesn\'t work. I get audio but no video. Same issue on both my Galaxy Nexus and my Nexus 7.   Of course, I had to sideload on the Nexus 7 since the app is not officially supported on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: None of the speeches will play, I don\'t even see where live streaming is an option. Really disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Where are the video highlights. I tried watching Jimmy carter speech,  fox news has it even though i finally found it and watch on youtube! ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: No problems. Just watched live and it was nice, no problems. I plan on watching the First Lady tonight :o)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Can\'t open the keyboard or select to skip at the very start... how do you not support a Nexus device?? It\'s the only pure Android platform out there!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont load anything
reviews.comment: Ooops something went wrong! was all I encountered using this app. Too bad as I really wanted to see Obama\'s speech.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Installed the app but my keyboard doesn\'t come up when I tap on the email address field, so I can\'t access the content.  Hope they fix the bug SOON!!!!

reviews.title: Great content, needs polish

reviews.title: Can\'t sign up for email.  Droid Razr.
reviews.comment: App will not allow me to sign up for email updates.  The initial screen option will not pull up my typing screen when I select the email or zip code box, and when I try via the side bar on the right after skipping the initial sign up, it lets me put my info in, but will not submit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont allow email...
reviews.comment: Great app, but it wont allow you to enter email address for updates.  Fix this please.

reviews.comment: Data overages possible.  Be warned.

reviews.title: Horrible, Incomplete, Outdated
reviews.comment: Wow this thing is horrible. Takes forever to load content. So much content is completely missing. \"Oops! Something went wrong\" is the most common screen display. And they even spelled \"Carolina\" wrong on the Charlotte section. #Amercia
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.comment: Hard to use and not much relevant information for participating on the myriad DNC related events.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Incredible depth, easy navigation and fast. Can\'t wait to watch Obama live.
